original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of what is beyond extremes is empty of what is beyond extremes.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of what is not broken or discarded is empty of what is not broken or discarded.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of nature is empty of the emptiness of nature.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena is empty of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of its own mark is empty of the emptiness of its own mark.

original: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of non-apprehension is empty of the emptiness of non-apprehension.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of non-entities is empty of the emptiness of non-entities.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of own-being is empty of the emptiness of own-being.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The emptiness of the own-being of non-entities is empty of the emptiness of the own-being of non-entities.

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ngo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ngo //
translated: A bodhisattva is empty of a bodhisattva.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de ltar na nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / phyi @408a *//
analyzed: de ltar na nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / phyi @408a *//
translated: in that way, the emptiness of internal phenomena is empty of the emptiness of internal phenomena, and the emptiness of external phenomena is empty of the emptiness of external phenomena.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
translated: emptiness of emptiness, emptiness of external and internal, emptiness of emptiness of emptiness, emptiness of great immensity, emptiness of the ultimate,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
translated: emptiness of conditioned phenomena, emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, emptiness of beyond extremes, emptiness of no beginning or end, emptiness of non-rejection,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of the emptiness of essential nature, the emptiness of the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of the emptiness of specific characteristics, the emptiness of the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of the emptiness of non-entities,

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: the emptiness of the emptiness of essential nature, the emptiness of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities, and the emptiness of the bodhisattva.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar gnas par bya'o //
translated: the bodhisattva mahāsattva should abide in the perfection of wisdom like that.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: gzhan yang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: gzhan yang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo //

analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ngo //

analyzed: dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams kyis stong @408b ngo //

analyzed: stobs rnams ni stobs rnams kyis stong ngo //

analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ngo //

analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ngo //

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ngo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ngo //
translated: and a bodhisattva is empty of a bodhisattva.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: de ltar na dran pa nye bar bzhag pa stong pa nyid dang / yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid dang / dbang po stong pa nyid dang / stobs stong pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: de ltar na dran pa nye bar bzhag pa stong pa nyid dang / yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa nyid dang / dbang po stong pa nyid dang / stobs stong pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid dang /
translated: Thus, the emptiness of the applications of mindfulness, the emptiness of the right efforts, the emptiness of the legs of miraculous power, the emptiness of the faculties, the emptiness of the powers, the emptiness of the branches of awakening,

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: the emptiness of the noble eightfold path, and the emptiness of the bodhisattvas—all of these are non-dual and not divided.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar gnas par bya'o //

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /

analyzed: gzhan yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ngo //

analyzed: bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ngo //

analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ngo //

analyzed: rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the liberations are empty of the liberations,🔽the aspects of the liberated gateways are empty of the aspects of the liberated gateways,

analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the emptiness gate of liberation is empty of the emptiness gate of liberation,🔽the signless gate of liberation is empty of the signless gate of liberation,

analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa @409a *//
translated: the wishless gate of liberation is empty of the wishless gate of liberation,🔽the ten powers are empty of the ten powers,🔽the four fearlessnesses are empty of the four fearlessnesses,🔽the four kinds of detailed and thorough knowledge are empty of the four kinds of detailed and thorough knowledge,🔽the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are empty of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

analyzed: nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas stong ngo //

original: mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the four detailed and thorough knowledges are empty of the four detailed and thorough knowledges,🔽the great love is empty of the great love,🔽the great compassion is empty of the great compassion,🔽the great joy is empty of the great joy,

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong ngo //

original: mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa rnams ni mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the fearlessnesses are empty of the fearlessnesses,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ngo //🔽byams pa chen po ni byams pa chen pos stong ngo //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong ngo // byams pa chen po ni byams pa chen pos stong ngo //
translated: the detailed and thorough knowledges are empty of the detailed and thorough knowledges,🔽great love is empty of great love,

original: snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen pos stong ngo //
analyzed: snying rje chen po ni snying rje chen pos stong ngo //

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are empty of the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ngo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ngo //
translated: and bodhisattvas are empty of bodhisattvas.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika!

original: de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid dang / bsam gtan stong pa nyid dang / tshad med pa stong pa nyid dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid dang / bsam gtan stong pa nyid dang / tshad med pa stong pa nyid dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid dang /
translated: In this way, the noble truths are empty of the noble truths,🔽the concentrations are empty of the concentrations, the immeasurables are empty of the immeasurables, the formless absorptions are empty of the formless absorptions,🔽the liberations are empty of the liberations, the correct and discerning awarenesses are empty of the correct and discerning awarenesses, the aspects of liberation are empty of the aspects of liberation, the meditative absorption of cessation is empty of the meditative absorption of cessation,

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa nyid dang / mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / @409b ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid dang / gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa nyid dang / mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / @409b ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid dang / gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of emptiness is empty of emptiness, the signless of signlessness is empty of signlessness, the wishless of wishlessness is empty of wishlessness,🔽the doors of liberation are empty of the doors of liberation, the powers are empty of the powers, the fearlessnesses are empty of the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges are empty of the detailed and thorough knowledges, the aspects of the tathāgata are empty of the aspects of the tathāgata, the distinct attributes of a buddha are empty of the distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid dang / mi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid dang / so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid dang / byams pa chen po stong pa nyid dang / snying rje chen po stong pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid dang / mi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid dang / so so yang dag par rig pa stong pa nyid dang / byams pa chen po stong pa nyid dang / snying rje chen po stong pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of the powers of the tathāgatas, the emptiness of the fearlessnesses of the tathāgatas, the emptiness of the detailed and thorough knowledges, the emptiness of great love, the emptiness of great compassion, and the emptiness of the distinct attributes of a buddha;

original: byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid de la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid de la gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do //
translated: and the emptiness of the bodhisattva is not two and cannot be made two.

original: koo shi ka /
analyzed: koo shi ka /
translated: Kauśika,

analyzed: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis /

analyzed: gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so // btsun pa rab 'byor /

analyzed: ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bya / rab 'byor gyis smras pa /

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'du byed la gnas par mi bya'o //

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis skye ba la gnas par mi bya'o //

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rga shi la gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rga shi la gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “One should not abide in aging and death, apprehending it as a self.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “One should not abide in the perfection of generosity, apprehending it as a self.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “One should not abide in the perfection of moral discipline, apprehending it as a self.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “One should not abide in the perfection of patience, apprehending it as a self.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: They should not stand in the perfection of perseverance by way of apprehending something.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: They should not stand in the perfection of concentration by way of apprehending something.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bya'o //🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bya'o // dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: They should not stand in the perfection of wisdom by way of apprehending something.🔽They should not stand in inner emptiness by way of apprehending something.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o // dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: They should not stand in outer emptiness by way of apprehending something.🔽They should not stand in inner and outer emptiness by way of apprehending something.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: They should not stand in the emptiness that is a non-apprehension of inner dharmas by way of apprehending something.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: They should not stand in the emptiness that is a non-apprehension of outer dharmas by way of apprehending something.🔽They should not stand in the emptiness that is a non-apprehension of inner and outer dharmas by way of apprehending something.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas @412b par mi bya'o //🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas @412b par mi bya'o // dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not abide in conditioned emptiness from the perspective of observing it.🔽“They should not abide in unconditioned emptiness from the perspective of observing it.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not abide in the emptiness of what transcends limits from the perspective of observing it.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o // dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not abide in the emptiness of no beginning and no end from the perspective of observing it.🔽“They should not abide in the emptiness of nonrepudiation from the perspective of observing it.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not abide in the emptiness of inherent existence from the perspective of observing it.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not abide in the emptiness of all things from the perspective of observing it.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not abide in the emptiness of defining characteristics from the perspective of observing it.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not abide in the emptiness of nonobservation from the perspective of observing it.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o // dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not abide in the emptiness of non-apprehension by way of apprehending.🔽They should not abide in the emptiness of essential nature by way of apprehending.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: They should not abide in the emptiness of the non-apprehension of an essential nature by way of apprehending.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not abide in the applications of mindfulness by way of apprehending.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: They should not abide in the right efforts by way of apprehending.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas par mi bya'o //🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dbang po rnams la gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas par mi bya'o // dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dbang po rnams la gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: They should not abide in the legs of miraculous power by way of apprehending.🔽They should not abide in the faculties by way of apprehending.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stobs rnams la gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stobs rnams la gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: They should not abide in the powers by way of apprehending.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas par @413a *//
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas par @413a *//

analyzed: mi bya'o // dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “One should not abide in the noble eightfold path.

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas par mi bya'o //

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams la gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams la gnas par mi bya'o //

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshad med pa rnams la gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshad med pa rnams la gnas par mi bya'o //

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par mi bya'o //

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa rnams la gnas par mi bya'o //

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par mi bya'o //

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “One should not abide in emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness.

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not abide in the superknowledges, perceiving them as a phenomenon.

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not abide in the meditative stabilities, perceiving them as a phenomenon.

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas par mi bya'o //

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la gnas par mi bya'o //

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa rnams la gnas par mi bya'o //

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gnas par mi bya'o //🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byams pa chen po rnams la gnas par mi bya'o //

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen @413b po la gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen @413b po la gnas par mi bya'o //

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not abide in the distinct attributes of a buddha, perceiving them as a phenomenon.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa la gnas par mi bya'o //🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa la gnas par mi bya'o // dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not stand in the śrāvaka vehicle as an objective.🔽They should not stand in the pratyekabuddha vehicle as an objective.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: They should not stand in the Buddha vehicle as an objective.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas par mi bya'o //

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas par mi bya'o //

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas par mi bya'o //

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dgra bcom pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang sangs rgyas nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dgra bcom pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o // dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang sangs rgyas nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: They should not stand in the state of a worthy one as an objective.🔽They should not stand in a pratyekabuddha’s awakening as an objective.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thams cad shes pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thams cad shes pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par mi bya'o //

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzugs zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzugs zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o // dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not stand in ‘form’ by way of apprehending something.🔽They should not stand in ‘feeling’ by way of apprehending something.

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'du shes zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o // dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'du byed ces bya bar gnas par @414a *//
translated: They should not stand in ‘perception’ by way of apprehending something.🔽They should not stand in ‘volitional factors’ by way of apprehending something.

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mig ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o // dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rna ba zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzugs zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not abide in terms of reference by way of the idea ‘form’.

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgra zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o // dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dri zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis reg ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o // dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not abide in the notion that ‘mental contact is my self,’🔽“They should not abide in the notion that ‘feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact is my self,’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o // dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not abide in the notion that ‘feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact is my self,’🔽“They should not abide in the notion that ‘feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact is my self,’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not abide in the notion that ‘feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact is my self,’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not abide in the notion that ‘feeling that arises from the condition of body contact is my self,’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not dwell on the idea, ‘Feeling conditioned by sensory contact that is visually compounded is present,’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sa'i khams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sa'i khams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not dwell on the idea, ‘The earth element is present,’

original: @415a *// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chu'i khams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: @415a *// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chu'i khams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not dwell on the idea, ‘The water element is present,’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis me'i khams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlung gi khams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis me'i khams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o // dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlung gi khams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not dwell on the idea, ‘The fire element is present,’🔽“They should not dwell on the idea, ‘The wind element is present,’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nam mkha'i khams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nam mkha'i khams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o // dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not dwell on the idea, ‘The space element is present,’🔽“They should not dwell on the idea, ‘The consciousness element is present,’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma rig pa zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma rig pa zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not dwell on the idea, ‘Ignorance is present,’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'du byed ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'du byed ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not dwell on the idea, ‘Formations are present,’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not abide in the notion that consciousness is real.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ming dang gzugs zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ming dang gzugs zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not abide in the notion that name and form are real.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis skye mched drug ces bya par gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis skye mched drug ces bya par gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not abide in the notion that the six sense fields are real.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis reg pa zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis reg pa zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not abide in the notion that contact is real.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sred pa zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o // dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sred pa zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not abide in the notion that sensation is real.🔽One should not abide in the notion that craving is real.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis len pa zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis srid pa zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis len pa zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o // dmigs pa'i tshul gyis srid pa zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not abide in the notion that grasping is real.🔽One should not abide in the notion that becoming is real.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis skye ba zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis skye ba zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not abide in the notion that birth is real.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rga shi zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rga shi zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: One should not abide in the notion that old age and death are real.

original: dmigs pa'i @415b tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i @415b tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not stand conceptually in ‘the perfection of giving.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o // dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not stand conceptually in ‘the perfection of morality.’🔽“They should not stand conceptually in ‘the perfection of patience.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not stand conceptually in ‘the perfection of perseverance.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not stand conceptually in ‘the perfection of concentration.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o // dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not stand conceptually in ‘the perfection of wisdom.’🔽“They should not stand conceptually in ‘inner emptiness.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not stand conceptually in ‘outer emptiness.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not stand conceptually in ‘the emptiness of the external and the emptiness of the internal.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not stand conceptually in ‘the emptiness of emptiness.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not stand conceptually in ‘the emptiness of the great.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o // dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o // dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not stand conceptually in ‘the emptiness of ultimate reality.’🔽“They should not stand conceptually in ‘the emptiness of conditioned phenomena.’🔽“They should not stand conceptually in ‘the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya @416a *//🔽bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya @416a *//🔽bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not stand conceptually in ‘the emptiness of what is beyond extremes.’🔽“They should not stand conceptually in ‘the emptiness of what is beginningless and endless.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not stand in the notion that ‘the emptiness of non-apprehension is a door to liberation’;

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not stand in the notion that ‘the emptiness of essential nature is a door to liberation’;

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o // dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not stand in the notion that ‘the emptiness of all things is a door to liberation’;🔽“They should not stand in the notion that ‘the emptiness of specific characteristics is a door to liberation’;

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o // dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not stand in the notion that ‘the emptiness of non-apprehension is a door to liberation’;🔽“They should not stand in the notion that ‘the emptiness of non-things is a door to liberation’;

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not stand in the notion that ‘the emptiness of essential nature is a door to liberation’;

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not stand in the notion that ‘the emptiness that is the essential nature of non-things is a door to liberation.’🔽“They should not stand in the notion that ‘the emptiness of the conditioned is a door to liberation’;

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not dwell, in an apprehending manner, on the notion ‘the applications of mindfulness.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not dwell, in an apprehending manner, on the notion ‘the right efforts.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dbang po rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o // dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dbang po rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not dwell, in an apprehending manner, on the notion ‘the legs of miraculous power.’🔽“They should not dwell, in an apprehending manner, on the notion ‘the faculties.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stobs rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stobs rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not dwell, in an apprehending manner, on the notion ‘the powers.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not dwell, in an apprehending manner, on the notion ‘the branches of awakening.’

original: dmigs @416b pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs @416b pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not dwell, in an apprehending manner, on the notion ‘the noble eightfold path.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not dwell, in an apprehending manner, on the notion ‘the noble truths.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “One should not dwell on the notion that the meditative concentrations are entities that can be known.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshad med pa rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshad med pa rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “One should not dwell on the notion that the immeasurables are entities that can be known.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “One should not dwell on the notion that the formless absorptions are entities that can be known.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “One should not dwell on the notion that the aspects of liberation are entities that can be known.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “One should not dwell on the notion that the aspects of entering the stream are entities that can be known.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “One should not dwell on the notion that the emptiness gate of liberation, the signless gate of liberation, and the wishless gate of liberation are entities that can be known.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “One should not dwell on the notion that the superknowledges are entities that can be known.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not dwell, in an apprehending manner, on the notion that the meditative stabilities are ‘the meditative stabilities. ’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not dwell, in an apprehending manner, on the notion that the dhāraṇī gateways are ‘the dhāraṇī gateways. ’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not dwell, in an apprehending manner, on the notion that the ten powers of the tathāgatas are ‘the ten powers of the tathāgatas. ’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not dwell, in an apprehending manner, on the notion that the four fearlessnesses are ‘the four fearlessnesses. ’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //🔽dmigs @417a *// pa'i tshul gyis byams pa chen po zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o // dmigs @417a *// pa'i tshul gyis byams pa chen po zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not dwell, in an apprehending manner, on the notion that the four detailed and thorough knowledges are ‘the four detailed and thorough knowledges. ’🔽“They should not dwell, in an apprehending manner, on the notion that great love is ‘great love. ’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen po zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen po zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not dwell, in an apprehending manner, on the notion that great compassion is ‘great compassion. ’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not dwell, in an apprehending manner, on the notion that the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are ‘the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha. ’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o // dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not stand with a reference point, thinking, ‘I am entering into the result of stream enterer.’🔽“They should not stand with a reference point, thinking, ‘I am entering into the result of once-returner.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o // dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not stand with a reference point, thinking, ‘I am entering into the result of non-returner.’🔽“They should not stand with a reference point, thinking, ‘I am entering into the state of a worthy one.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang byang chub ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang byang chub ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not stand with a reference point, thinking, ‘I am entering into a pratyekabuddha’s awakening.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not stand with a reference point, thinking, ‘I am entering into the knowledge of path aspects.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “They should not stand with a reference point, thinking, ‘I am entering into the knowledge of all aspects.’

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzugs rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzugs rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //

translated: “In a similar vein, they should not abide in the notion that the consciousness of the eyes is calm or that it is not calm.🔽“In a similar vein, they should not abide in the notion that the consciousness of the eyes is empty or that it is not empty, or in the notion that it is with signs or that it is signless, or in the notion that it has aspirations or that it is without aspirations.🔽“In a similar vein, they should not abide in the notion that the consciousness of the eyes is pure or that it is impure.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //🔽dmigs pa'i tshul @425b gyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //

translated: “In a similar vein, they should not abide in the notion that the consciousness of the eyes is afflicted or that it is purified, or in the notion that it is arising or that it is ceasing.🔽“In a similar vein, they should not abide in the notion that the consciousness of the eyes is entities or that it is a non-entity.🔽“In a similar vein, they should not abide in the notion that the consciousness of the eyes is existent or that it is nonexistent.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “In a similar vein, they should not abide in the notion that the consciousness of the eyes is the emptiness of inherent existence or that it is not the emptiness of inherent existence, or in the notion that it is the absence of attributes or that it is not the absence of attributes, or in the notion that it is the absence of expectancy or that it is not the absence of expectancy.🔽“In a similar vein, they should not abide in the notion that the consciousness of the eyes is the perfection of giving or that it is not the perfection of giving, or in the notion that it is the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, or the perfection of wisdom, or that it is not the perfection of wisdom.🔽“In a similar vein, they should not abide in the notion that the consciousness of the eyes is the applications of mindfulness or that it is not the applications of mindfulness, or in the notion that it is the correct exertions, the supports for miraculous ability, the faculties, the powers, the branches of enlightenment, or the noble eightfold path, or that it is not the noble eightfold path.🔽“In a similar vein, they should not abide in the notion that the consciousness of the eyes is the ten powers of the tathāgatas or that it is not the ten powers of the tathāgatas, or in the notion that it is the four forms

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o /
translated: “In a manner of objectification, one should not dwell on the idea that the mind consciousness is calm or not calm.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “In a manner of objectification, one should not dwell on the idea that the mind consciousness is void or not void.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //🔽dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //

translated: “In a manner of objectification, one should not dwell on the idea that the mind consciousness is empty or not empty.🔽“In a manner of objectification, one should not dwell on the idea that the mind consciousness has a sign or is signless.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “In a manner of objectification, one should not dwell on the idea that the mind consciousness has a particular inherent nature or is without a particular inherent nature.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “In a manner of objectification, one should not dwell on the idea that the eye contact is permanent or impermanent.

analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “In a way that involves apprehending, they should not dwell on the idea that the sensory element of the eyes is happiness or that it is suffering.

original: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar gnas par mi bya'o //
translated: “In a way that involves apprehending, they should not dwell on the idea that the sensory element of the eyes is a self or that it is not a self.
